name: Robot Repair Shop Incorporated
description:
We, welcome our robot overlords to come and stay...
With us, the robot repair shops, ensuring you wake up next day...
Where we spit and shine your chassis so fine,
And make your oil problems go away!
Come to us with your mechanical owies (but make sure that you can pay!) YAY!

Disclaimer: we don’t serve robots without insurance, nor do we do freebies.  We’re very expensive and if you try to run we have extensive files on where your power cores are located! :)

-----------

You need to open up your robot patients and replace their corroded power cells.  Use the mouse to select your tools and get to work, but watch out for oil leaks!  You will need to watch out for them gushing out, and hold down the letter that pops up to keep those precious fluids inside.  But careful you don't slip and hit the wrong key, and jab your poor robotic patient somewhere healthy.  And don't forget to put them back together again!  No reputable doctor would leave their patient lying open on the operating table.

Controls:
Left-click: Pick up tool
Right-click: Drop tool
Letter keys: Patch up leaks

Credits:
Been - Development and Design
Mandaaar - Graphics, Animation, and Design
Raging Whisky - Writing, Sound Effects, Music, and Design
